messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Chancellor Angela Merkel says her conservative bloc will begin exploratory talks next week. Talks will be with the pro-business Free Democrats (FDP) and the environmentalist Greens.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Catalonia s High Court has asked for Spanish national police to provide extra security at the court building. The move is in case the Catalan parliament goes ahead with a unilateral declaration of independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Men in plain clothes fired shots in the air as hundreds of opposition supporters marched through the capital. Demonstrators demanding reforms ahead of a presidential election scheduled for Oct. 26.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy says Spain will not be divided. Catalonia held a referendum that authorities say showed voters overwhelmingly support independence. Catalonia has its own language and culture and is led by a pro-independence regional government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Inmobiliaria Colonial has called a board meeting for Monday to discuss moving its head office out of Catalonia. Barcelona-based Colonial joins a number of other firms that have decided, or are considering, moving their head offices from Catalonia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The ceasefire was set to expire at the end of October. Fighting between the army and rebels in Kordofan and Blue Nile regions broke out in 2011. Conflict in Darfur began in 2003 when mainly non-Arab tribes took up arms.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Jessica Davey will appear at Westminster Magistrates  Court on Monday. She was detained by police on Saturday before she gained access to palace grounds. British police are on high alert after five attacks blamed on terrorism this year.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Catalonia will apply a referendum law, which calls for a declaration of independence if a referendum shows a majority in favor. The Catalan government says more than 90 percent of people who voted in an Oct. 1 referendum voted in favor of independence from Spain.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
German Chancellor Angela Merkel s Christian Democrats agree on refugee cap. Agreement removes hurdle to coalition talks with other parties. Merkel aims to build a nationally untested coalition.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Abertis will meet on Monday to discuss moving its head office out of Catalonia. Several big Catalan companies have announced plans to move their registered office to other cities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkey is implementing a deal agreed with Russia and Iran to reduce violence in Syria s northern province of Idlib. President Tayyip Erdogan said if Turkey had not acted  bombs would fall on our cities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The explosion sent a giant fireball into the sky above the eastern part of Accra. Ghana, a relatively new oil and gas producer, has suffered several recent accidents. An explosion in 2015 killed around 100 people.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The men were hit while traveling in a car in Raghwan district, residents said. There was no immediate statement from the militant group or from U.S. forces.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

In June Trump signed a temporary order to keep the U.S. embassy in Tel Aviv. In an interview with former Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee on the TBN program. Trump noted his administration was working on a plan for peace between the two sides.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy says he could use constitutional powers to suspend Catalonia s autonomy. Rajoy also said he planned to leave in Catalonia the extra 4,000 police officers the government had shipped in to region for an independence vote.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkish foreign minister Mevlut Cavusoglu says Turkey's aim is to prevent clashes completely and facilitate the process for a political solution. He says steps to be taken in the field would be determined by cooperation between Turkish Armed Forces and its intelligence service.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
London ambulance service said they had treated 11 people, mostly for head and leg injuries. Nine people were taken to hospital after a car collided with pedestrians near Natural History Museum.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian riot police detain at least 10 opposition protesters in central St Petersburg. Hundreds of anti-Kremlin activists marched towards the city s main street. Police across Russia detained more than 100 opposition activists earlier on Saturday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

London police say they are keeping an open mind after a car collided with pedestrians outside the Natural History Museum. Earlier a spokesman told Reuters it was not being treated as a terrorism-related incident.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
London s Natural History Museum says there had been a serious incident outside. Museum spokesman told Reuters that no one was being allowed into the building.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A 38-year-old refugee from Sri Lanka was shot and killed by Swiss police. He charged at two other asylum seekers with knives, law enforcement officials said. Police were called to a refugee centre after a report of an altercation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The United States Embassy in Saudi Arabia warned U.S. citizens to exercise caution in the area around the Peace Palace in Jeddah. There were several unconfirmed reports that security forces had foiled an attack near the king s palace.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Erdogan: Turkish soldiers not in Syria s Idlib yet, but Free Syria Army carrying out operation. Free Syrian Army rebel groups said they were preparing to enter with Turkish backing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

There is a serious operation in Syria s Idlib today, and this will continue. Much of Idlib is currently controlled by an jihadist-led alliance of fighters. We will never allow a terror corridor along our borders in Syria, Erdogan says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

New Zealand opposition Labour Party leader Jacinda Ardern says a final election vote tally put her party in a strengthened position. The final count for the Sept. 23 election showed Labour and its potential coalition partner the Green Party with an extra two seats.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Final count in the Sept. 23 election showed National had lost two seats compared to the preliminary count on election night. The inconclusive election results have left neither major party with enough votes to form a government without populist New Zealand First.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The helicopter crashed 4 kilometers (2.5 miles) northeast of the town of El Salto. Authorities are searching for the bodies of seven other military members. Military authorities are investigating what happened to the helicopter.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The bodies were found in the same orange jumpsuits the victims were wearing when they were filmed being killed in February 2015. Islamic State took control of Sirte in 2015 and lost the city late last year.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The United Nation s aviation agency International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) on Friday condemned North Korea for continued launching of ballistic missiles. The agency urged North Korea to comply with international aviation standards.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Manfred Weber is head of the conservative bloc in the European Parliament. Weber called for urgent negotiations between the two sides. Catalonia s head of foreign affairs said the region s parliament would meet on Monday to debate independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump spoke with French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday. The two discussed joint counterterrorism operations in the Sahel region of Africa. A fourth soldier was killed during an Oct. 4 attack in Niger.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iran denies a Reuters report that Tehran may be open to discussing the controversial program with major powers. Iran has in all bilateral diplomatic meetings ... emphasized that its defensive missile program is not negotiable.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Lawyers for Batista family say judge's decision is based on newspaper reports. Federal Judge Ricardo Leite is demanding the family deposits $506 million. Earlier in the day, Leite ordered the assets of the Batistas be frozen as part of an investigation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Italy s highest court on Friday upheld a four-year jail sentence on the former chairman of Generali Cesare Geronzi for his role in the 2003 bankruptcy of food company Cirio. The decision, by the Rome-based Court of Cassation, is final and cannot be appealed. Three of the four years will be wiped out under a national amnesty.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Switzerland is in touch with Spain and Catalonia about resolving a row over the region s moves towards independence. Conditions for promoting talks are not yet ripe, the foreign ministry in Bern said on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Final results show yes votes winning 90.18 percent of votes cast against 7.83 percent of  no votes. Catalan government put voter turnout at nearly 2.3 million people. The referendum was declared illegal by the Spanish government and courts.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont will address the regional parliament next Tuesday. The speaker of the Catalan assembly, Carme Forcadell, has called the plenary session for 6 pm.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. government is deeply concerned about the political environment in Kenya. Police and protesters clashed ahead of its presidential election on Oct. 26. The United States did not back any party or candidate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Secessionist parties in the Catalan parliament are discussing an independence declaration. The declaration will be submitted to the regional assembly next Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The man was stopped as he tried to get onto a flight at Gothenburg s Landvetter airport. A regular security check flagged up signs of explosive materials. The suspicious objects have been analysed during the day.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Switzerland is ready to provide a platform for dialogue between the Spanish government and Catalonia, state broadcaster RTS reported. It cited the foreign ministry as saying Swiss authorities were in contact with both parties.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spain passes a law to make it easier for companies to move their operations. Some businesses consider leaving the region of Catalonia amid a rising conflict. The new law loosens the bureaucratic red tape needed for a company s board to take the decision.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Tokyo Governor Yuriko Koike said there was no need for a major change in the Bank of Japan s hyper-easy monetary policy. Koike's new conservative party is challenging Japan s ruling bloc in an Oct. 22 election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkey wants to open a new border gate with Iraq in cooperation with the central government in Baghdad. Turkey wants to boost cooperation with central Iraqi government on economy, defense, security and political issues.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British Prime Minister Theresa May has postponed a trip to China. Trip had been provisionally planned for November due to a timetable clash with U.S. President Donald Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Theresa May is due to attend a charity coffee morning in her constituency. May is facing an open rebellion from some of her own lawmakers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spanish government representative in Catalonia apologizes for violent response by police. Enric Millo says he can't help but regret it and apologize on behalf of officers that intervened. First apology by a Madrid government official over the clashes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to announce soon that he will decertify the landmark agreement. Trump faces an Oct. 15 deadline for certifying that Iran is complying with the deal s terms.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont will speak in the regional parliament next Tuesday. It was unclear whether the meeting of the parliament scheduled for Monday would still go ahead.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said Putin and Saudi Arabia s King Salman had discussed military cooperation in talks on Thursday. He said other countries should not worry about such ties.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bus carrying migrant workers from Uzbekistan shunted several hundred metres down the track. Some people say the passengers tried to push the bus off the track, spokesman says. Bus had a license plate registered in Kazakhstan, Russian news agencies report.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Thirteen Chinese fishermen died after their boat collided with a Hong Kong oil tanker. Three people were found alive after Thursday s collision. It was not known if there was any damage to the tanker or what caused the accident.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Nobel Peace Prize winner Beatrice Fihn says U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un should know that nuclear weapons are illegal. ICAN Executive Director: Having nuclear weapons, possessing nuclear weapons and developing nuclear weapons is illegal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Germany supports the goal of a world without nuclear weapons. Government congratulates the Nobel Prize committee on this choice.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Spokeswoman for International Campaign to Abolish Nuclear Weapons overjoyed. Daniela Varano: "As you can imagine we are elated" "It s great recognition for the work that the campaigners did"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The leader of the International Campaign to Abolish Nuclear Weapons is delighted. Beatrice Fihn was delighted with the news that the grassroots organization had been awarded the Nobel Peace Prize.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Muslim Rohingyas continue to flee Myanmar to Bangladesh. U.N. is bracing for possible  further exodus, humanitarian aid chief says. An estimated 2,000 Rohingya are escaping Rakhine daily for Bangladesh.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Environment minister Michael Gove says Theresa May has qualities to be PM. Up to 30 lawmakers are plotting to unseat May, according to reports.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Former Conservative Party chairman Grant Shapps says 30 lawmakers back a plot to topple British Prime Minister Theresa May. Divisions over May s future burst into the open on Friday after her conference speech was ruined by a comedian.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Russian-made Mi-17 helicopter was ferrying military officials to a forward post. India is trying to modernize its airforce with new planes and helicopters. The cause of the crash was not known immediately.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban says Europe must focus on preserving the free movement of EU citizens. Orban, a fierce critic of perceived bureaucratic over-reach from the European Union, said proposals to tighten labor rules and internal border controls jeopardize significant achievements.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Saudi King Salman said there was consensus with Russia s leadership on broadening the scope of relations. He met with President Vladimir Putin in Moscow.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Former Conservative Party chairman Grant Shapps says Theresa May should call a leadership election. Shapps, who chaired the party between 2012 and 2015, said up to 30 Conservative lawmakers backed the bid.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Theresa May should stay on as British prime minister, Home Secretary Amber Rudd writes. Rudd said the government would deliver Brexit under May s leadership.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The meeting had been due to take place in the Cypriot capital Nicosia from Oct. 9 to 10. Cyprus President Nicos Anastasiades spoke extensively with Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The anonymous phone calls have caused huge disruption at shopping centers, train stations and public buildings. Alexander Bortnikov, the head of the FSB, said authorities knew the identities of those responsible. He said they were four Russian citizens based abroad with accomplices inside Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Banco Sabadell decides to transfer its legal base from Catalonia to Alicante. Decision comes as businesses in the wealthy northeastern region are growing increasingly worried about political upheaval there.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spanish Constitutional Court suspended a session of the Catalan parliament that planned to declare Catalonia s independence from Spain. But Carme Forcadell said the parliament had taken no decision yet on whether Monday s session would go ahead.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy called on Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont to abandon plans to unilaterally declare independence. Rajoy said the solution to the Catalan crisis was a prompt return to legality.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Saudi Arabia is working closely with Russia on uniting Syria s opposition. Moscow and Riyadh agreed on the need to preserve Syria s territorial integrity and state institutions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
blast reported inside a building in Wishaw, southeast of Glasgow. Emergency services are at the scene and two injured parties are being treated.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
French troops involved in operation near Niger s border with Mali on Thursday. Move comes a day after an attack that killed three U.S. Army Special Forces members.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

King Salman says a political solution to the conflict in Syria must be found. He also said the international community must take responsibility for what is happening to the Muslim Rohingya community in Myanmar.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iran must stop meddling in the Middle East, visiting Saudi King Salman tells Russian President Vladimir Putin. Security and stability of the Gulf region is an urgent necessity for achieving stability and security in Yemen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The European Commission is not conducting any assessments of the impact of the political crisis in Catalonia on Spain's economy. This issue is being dealt with by dialogue, Commission Vice President Valdis Dombrovskis said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May showed guts and grace, business minister Greg Clark says. Clark added that there was huge warmth towards May in the conference hall. May s bid to reassert her dwindling authority was ruined on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Business minister Greg Clark says ruling Conservative Party must remain cool-headed. Speech by Prime Minister Theresa May at annual conference ruined by a prankster. Some Conservative members of parliament discussing whether to ask her to resign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May is not considering resigning, Sky news reported. Downing Street: Resignation is not an issue, Sky said on its screen. A spokesman for PM May did not comment on the report.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A Russian air strike killed 49 Nusra Front militants including seven of its field commanders in Syria s Idlib province. Russia said on Wednesday it had critically injured a leader of the Tahrir al-Sham militant group.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Saudi Arabia s King Salman arrived in Moscow on Wednesday, Russian state television footage showed. The Rossiya-24 channel showed Salman s plane arriving at Vnukovo airport.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Three U.S. Army Special Forces soldiers were killed and two were wounded. The soldiers were on a routine patrol with Nigerien troops they were training. Earlier, a spokesman for U.s.-Nigerien patrol had come under hostile fire.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont needs to respect the law, PM's office says. If Puigemont wants to talk or negotiate, or wants to send mediators, he first needs to go back to the law.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Carles Puigdemont says he is in favor of mediation to find a way out of the Catalan crisis. The Catalan parliament is expected to unilaterally declare independence from Spain next Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Russian Defence Ministry said it had seriously injured Abu Mohamad al-Golani. Golani headed the Nusra Front before it merged with other groups to form Tahrir al-Sham.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British police say they carried out a controlled explosion on a suspect package. Britain is on its second-highest level of security alert after several attacks in the country.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
London s Angel underground station is closed while authorities respond to a security alert. Transport For London: Security alert outside the station.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British police were alerted to a suspect package in London s Islington area. A cordon was in place, a police spokesman said. Angel underground station was closed while authorities responded.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Rescue workers recover body of the last person known to be missing. 369 people died in the Sept. 19 earthquake, the most deadly in a generation. Almost two-thirds of the fatalities in the capital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Putin calls for all sides to dial down the rhetoric on North Korea. U.S. President Donald Trump is listening to Russia s views on the North Korean missile crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro thanked Russian President Vladimir Putin for his political and diplomatic support in difficult times. Maduro told Putin at talks in the Kremlin. I m very thankful for the agreement on grain, it has helped keep consumption in Venezuela stable.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro is visiting Moscow. Putin says Russia will continue its economic cooperation with Venezuela.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A series of attacks by Islamic State in Syria on government forces had come from an area near the border with Jordan. The attackers had the precise coordinates of the Syrian government forces, Russia said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Carles Puigdemont says he already feels like the president of a free country. More than two million Catalans voted to leave Spain in a banned referendum last Sunday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Catalan business lobby Cercle d Economia says it is extremely worried by the prospect of Catalonia declaring independence from Spain. Such a declaration would plunge the country into an extraordinarily complex situation, lobby says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Islamic State released a video on Tuesday that it said showed two soldiers captured by its fighters in Syria. Russia has been backing the Syrian military against militants.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Putin: Some forces are making use of Russian-American relations to resolve internal political problems in the United States. Moscow has lots of friends in the U.S. who genuinely want to improve relations with Russia, Putin says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Iran and Turkey will work together to confront the disintegration of Iraq and Syria to ease tension in the crisis-hit region, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkey will take stronger steps in retaliation for the Iraqi Kurdish referendum. President Tayyip Erdogan said the referendum had no legitimacy and had only been recognized by Israel. He also said the goal of raising Turkish-Iranian trade volume to $30 billion remained on the agenda.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

King Salman left on Wednesday for an official trip to Russia. He is set to meet President Vladimir Putin for talks on oil production and regional policy. Several investment deals, including on a liquefied natural gas project, could also be signed during the trip.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Vladimir Putin said Russia was exercising a policy of non-interference. Putin said it was in no-one s interest to cut off oil supplies from Iraq s Kurdistan.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Theresa May says she is confident of getting a deal that works for both Britain and the EU. She told members that the government was planning for every eventuality in the talks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Islamic State claims an attack in the Libyan city of Misrata. Militants loyal to the group attacked a court building in the city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May struggled to deliver her keynote speech to the Conservative Party s annual conference. With the party members applauding to keep May going, she had to stop on several occasions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British Prime Minister Theresa May says her party must fight for a Conservative mainstream political agenda. May spoke in her address to the annual party conference.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

It is important for Spain to uphold the rule of law to preserve stability, spokesman says. Germany is watching developments there closely, Steffen Seibert says. He describes the conflict between Madrid and Catalonia as an internal matter.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Pro-independence Catalan parties Junts Pel Si and CUP have asked parliament to meet to discuss and possibly declare the region s independence from Spain. The regional parliament s governing body is meeting today to decide when to call a parliamentary session to discuss the results of a banned referendum.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. committees for women s and children s rights call on Myanmar to stop violence. Hundreds of thousands of Rohingya Muslims have fled in the past six weeks. Committee: "We are particularly worried about the fate of Rohingya women and children"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Spain s High Court has called on the head of the Catalan police to testify for the alleged crime of sedition. High Court judge Carmen Lamela has also called on deputy police official Teresa Laplana and heads of the independent groups Omnium Cultural and the ANC.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A bomb planted by Kurdish militants ripped into a military vehicle, killing four soldiers. The soldiers were traveling in southeast Turkey near the border with Iran. Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants were behind the attack, authorities said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

More than half of Germans, 57 percent, want a three-way coalition. Merkel s conservatives emerged from a Sept. 24 national election as the biggest party. The Social Democrats (SPD) want to go into opposition after suffering their worst result since 1933.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will hold phone talks with U.S. President Donald Trump. Tensions have grown on the Korean peninsula since reclusive North Korea conducted its sixth and most powerful nuclear test.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Puerto Rico earlier this year filed the biggest bankruptcy in U.S. municipal history. The island is struggling to regain economic stability in the face of a $72 billion debt load.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The worst hurricane to hit the U.S. territory in more than 90 years directly killed 19 people. Just hours earlier when President Donald Trump visited the island the official death toll remained as it has for days at 16.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The request could come as early as Wednesday. It combines $16 billion for the government-backed flood insurance program and almost $13 billion in new relief.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Nabeel al-Amudi, head of the Saudi Ports Authority, appointed transport minister. Amudi replaces Sulaiman al-Hamdan, who has been named as  the minister for civil service.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands were battered by hurricanes Irma and Maria. Both territories will be heavily reliant on relief from the federal government. Puerto Rico is undergoing a debt restructuring under federal oversight.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump praised federal officials and the governor of Puerto Rico during a visit to the territory in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria. Trump jokingly chastised the island for jeopardizing budget resources.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representative Speaker Paul Ryan said he expects to hear from the Trump administration about getting more relief to help Puerto Rico, Texas and Florida recover from Hurricanes Irma and Maria.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell says he expects a funding request from the Trump administration for disaster relief for Puerto Rico by mid-October. McConnell met with the island territory s representatives on Tuesday and discussed Puerto Rico s needs after Hurricane Maria.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer says President Donald Trump should stop blaming Puerto Ricans for the hurricane that devastated the island. Schumer: Mr. President, stop the blame game. Start making the situation better.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Cuba's Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez angrily protested the expulsion of 15 diplomats from the Cuban embassy in Washington. Rodriguez said Washington had failed to provide sufficient information for an investigation into the matter.
True
